content: With 7 uses, using the Gourd grants Chill immunity, ensuring you can't be slowed by ice damage. Additionally, when using it, your maximum stamina is increased for a short duration, adding a nice boon to your overall stats in the middle of a fight. Unfortunately, the Fiery Gourd can't be upgraded at the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove in Black Wind Mountain.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fiery_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Fiery Gourd'.
The content is as follows:
With 7 uses, using the Gourd grants Chill immunity, ensuring you can't be slowed by ice damage. Additionally, when using it, your maximum stamina is increased for a short duration, adding a nice boon to your overall stats in the middle of a fight. Unfortunately, the Fiery Gourd can't be upgraded at the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove in Black Wind Mountain.
